Portfolio Resume

I am a full-stack web developer and software engineer, an expert in Javascript/Node.js development and user interface design using React with the latest design tools. I contribute to Open-Source software and have developed award-winning projects at Hackathons.

The background image on my home page is a Sentinel-2 satellite image of the Bay Area sourced from AWS S3.

This website is Open-Source, check it out on GitHub.
